title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 34-2.3 - Prohibited business practices by health services purveyors-general
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 34-2.3 - Prohibited business practices by health services purveyors-general

State Regulations
(a) No health services purveyor shall solicit, receive, accept, or agree to receive or accept any payment or other consideration from a clinical laboratory, or its agent, employee or fiduciary for the referral of specimens for the performance of clinical laboratory services. (b) No health services purveyor shall participate in the division, transference, assignment, rebate, or splitting of fees with any clinical laboratory, or its agent, employee or fiduciary, or with any other health services purveyor, in relation to clinical laboratory services. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
34-2.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
